author: wn.com
title: 23 October 2015 United Nations remains 'beacon for all humanity,' says Ban ahead of 70th ...
text: ( Source : United Nations Security Council ) 23 October 2015 - Marking the 70th anniversary of the Organization ahead of UN Day on 24 October , Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon said there is only one flag that belongs to everyone - the blue flag
